code: public boolean start() {     long start = System.currentTimeMillis().     do {         try {             if (condition.call()) {                 return true.             }         } catch (Exception ignored) {         }         try {             Thread.sleep(sleepInterval).         } catch (InterruptedException e) {             Thread.currentThread().interrupt().             return false.         }     } while (!isTimeoutExpired(start)).     return false. }
private boolean isTimeoutExpired(long start) {     return (System.currentTimeMillis() - start) >= delay. }
